pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AerForgeA game engine made with pygame.## Getting Started1) Install Python2) Open cmd/terminal and type:```pip install AerForge```## Examples# Creating a window``` pythonfrom aerforge import *forge = Forge()@forge.eventdef update(): passforge.run()```# Creating a cube``` pythonfrom aerforge import *forge = Forge()class Cube(Entity): def __init__(self): super().__init__( window = forge, shape = shape.Rect, width = 20, height = 20, x = 0, y = 0, color = color.Color(0, 255, 255) ) self.center()cube = Cube()@forge.eventdef update(): passforge.run()```
